latestAsset.Description: This app allows users to launch the application for signature capture on Android tablets, clear the capture area, and save the signature to device.

Java utility method for reading URLs from a property file. • Replaces URL dynamically during service call. • Helps to keep consistent environment from development through production (service definition, Java artifacts). • Change URL for debugging and testing purpose. • Configurable by service type. • Supports generic and specific service URLs.
Locates the iOS bundle identifier at run time. • Identifies if it’s a market application or non-market application. • Enable and disable specific features of an app based on the bundle identifier.
Securely store key value pair in iOS Keychain.
The JDBC adapter allows users to query tables and stored procedures. (For on-perm Kony Servers)
Demonstrates integration with Bluetooth-enabled devices.
Allows you to capture a signature on a mobile device while offline and store it locally.

Designs for a sample Field Services application.

KonyStudio is an open, flexible development environment. You can import, manage, and use third-party widgets available from other libraries and frameworks. Also, create your own custom widgets by importing associated CSS and JavaScript files. This demo application demonstrate the importing of a custom Sencha touch widget to a Kony application.

Sample app that authenticates against Salesforce.com and consumes protected integration, sync, and messaging services from Kony MobileFabric using a native SDK. Getting Started tutorials can be found here: http://docs.kony.com/tutorials/MobileFabric/.

Twexxt Goals tracks anything a user is interested in. Enter a goal name, goal level, and how often you want to receive SMS prompts to track progress. You can track anything, including the distance you run, grades you received, moods you were in, and virtually any quantifiable goal. Users can optionally receive motivational messages to help them attain their goals. Twexxt Goals also shows daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly reports to show progress.

ZineOne is a real-time mobile messaging platform that helps brands increase conversion rates on mobile. Close the gap between mobile browsing and transaction with this app. Build context from each user's in-app activity, analyze aggregate data, and take actions based on server-side controls for individual users in real time. M-commerce apps can contextual in-app actions to funnel post-acquisition customer journeys into transaction success.

Details.Name: verasynthfaassecuremobileconnectivitywithoutvpn
Details.Title: VeraSynth FaaS - Secure Mobile Connectivity Without VPN

latestAsset.Description: Are your employees abandoning the internal mobile apps because of the horrible user experience caused by VPN? Is your network operations team asking for more budget for VPN hardware because 5x mobile devices are connecting through it? Are your IT developers unsure how to securely connect mobile devices to internal IT systems? Have your servers ever been adversely affected by new vulnerabilities such as Heartbleed, Shellshock or Poodle? Verasynth FaaS provides a secure mobile connectivity platform for the enterprises by taking a fresh approach to API publishing. The Firewall As A Service (FaaS) helps securely connect mobile devices to corporate IT systems behind firewall, without using VPN. It delivers a new level of security and productivity features for IT developers and admins that have never been imagined before. The monolithic legacy Information Systems sitting behind corporate firewalls can now be enabled for the new mobile world with unprecedented ease while simultaneously enhancing the existing security apparatus. The API Reflection capability helps IT developers publish secure APIs with the same ease that you expect from online backup services such as Dropbox™. Further more, Verasynth's patent pending cloud DMZ architecture helps interchange data in real-time with your servers, without exposing your servers to the public internet. You can’t hack what you can’t see! For more information, please check http://www.faas.io. Contact us at info@verasynth.com, or call (408) 462-5649.

UST Global's Mobility Solution Services help enterprises realize their mobile initiatives by performing assessments, building roadmaps, identifying and designing applications, and developing them for various devices. Once developed, we test, deploy, manage and maintain your mobile applications.

Details.Name: infostretchleadermobileappdevelopmenttesting
Details.Title: InfoStretch - The Leader in Mobile App Development & Testing

latestAsset.Description: InfoStretch provides expert mobile solutions to its enterprise customers in different verticals such as Finance, Banking, Telecom, Travel and Retail. We have worked with several Fortune 500 customers and futuristic companies over the years, and enabled a sound mobile strategy based on their business need and requirement.

Cloudfuze is a universal platform which connects to any Cloud from any device from any location enabling easy file access, sharing, collaboration and federation along with proper enterprise controls. We connect to 30 cloud storages and ECMs. We have enabled these connectivity through our APIs on to our Android and iOS application.
Built on the HTML5 WebSocket standard, the Gateway enables mobile users, marketplaces and machines to connect and communicate in real-time, securely, more reliably and at unprecedented scale.

Kony HR is an accelerator app configured on Kony Modeler, that allows you to extend your HR administration systems to capture, submit and approve employee attendance and expense submission anytime, anywhere. Whether on the road or on site, this application controls key HR administrative processes for managers and employees.

The Kony Retail Banking app accelerator is built on Kony Modeler. Customers are engaging you at their convenience, not yours. Kony Retail Banking provides a unified customer experience across every interaction point with your financial institution. Whether mobile, tablet or your website, the Kony Retail Banking solution allows you to deliver a unique experience for each device platform.

Mobile solutions play an important role in engaging members and enabling efficient ways of managing care. The Kony Healthcare accelerator app that is configured on Kony Modeler, allows members to manage their health plans, benefits, prescriptions and research for medication, providers, plans etc. from any digital channel (mobile, tablet or desktop) enabling healthcare organizations to leverage every channel in a holistic way.

Provide your organization a mobile-first optimized experience designed to help you manage your assets. Improve asset management with optimized workflows and greater collaboration. Built on Kony Modeler, make rapid changes to workflows and backend integration that can be deployed in real time.

Provide your field organization a mobile-first optimized experience designed to work the way your field workers do. Improve your customer engagements with optimized workflows and greater collaboration. Built on Kony Modeler, make rapid changes to workflows and backend integration that can be deployed in real time.

SPLYT’s revolutionary approach to web, social, and mobile app analytics puts the power in the hands of application owners. Product managers and other business executives can explore user preferences and drive application enhancements faster and more efficiently – with less involvement from programmers and data scientists.

  • Contextual Analytics
  • Multi-variant A/B Testing
  • App Personalization and Targeting
  • Live Tuning Variables
  • Simple SDK integration

App2App Connect is an easy way for developers to extend their mobile apps to accept credit card payments on the spot and online without any extra hardware. Designed for business applications that help SMBs manage clients/forms/orders from their phones, A2A Connect enables developers to embed a “Take Payment” button in their app with minimal coding so that their business users can take advantage of Flint’s easy mobile payment processing, instant account activation, low fees & transaction data.

The Kony MobileFabric Custom Report Downloader is a sample Java application that runs custom reports built from the MobileFabric console and returns the results in csv format, without having to log in to the MobileFabric console using a browser. The executable Java JAR along with code and the user guide are attached.

This code can be extended or customized to run custom reports periodically via a Java service, Windows Scheduler or a Cron job for customers that need access to reports on a recurring basis.

Resources.fileDescription: Instructions to run the JAR and compile code.

latestAsset.Description:
The Kitchen Sink prototype demonstrates various user interface components that can be designed with Kony Visualizer. To preview this protoype, download the Kony Visualizer app from the Apple App Store or Google Marketplace. Enter the prototype code: "2QWFI"

If you don't already have a Kony Cloud login for the app, please register for a free account first.

Please note that the Kitchen Sink App is very large and may take serveral minutes to download and install depending on the speed of your network connection.

Getting Started tutorials can be found here: http://docs.kony.com/tutorials/MobileFabric/.

Aternity Mobile APM provides the reporting and analytics that enterprises need to ensure excellent mobile experience for any app developed and managed by the Kony Mobility Platform. Aternity seamlessly integrates Mobile APM for iOS, Android, and Windows tablet apps used by consumers and the workforce, so developers, IT Ops, and the line of business can monitor them centrally, along with apps running on physical and virtual devices.

An app through which we can find near by places, of a varity of categories. This app is built using Kony Visualizer Starter, Kony Mobile Fabric and Google Places services.

No need to download and install this app onto your device. If you have Kony Visualizer Functional Preview app on your device then you can access and use this app via the Kony Visualizer Functional Preview app

Short code to access Kony Google Places app from Kony Visualizer Functional Preview app: GZLZI

Supported Platforms: Android

Amadeus Data Adapter is a useful adapter that helps you rapidly build innovative travel apps. Amadeus Data Adapter connects to the Amadeus Travel Innovation sandbox and retrieves relevant information on the availability of flights, hotels, and rental cars. The adapter supports searching through geo-location, nearby airport, or airport code. The adapter also provides information on SNCF train routes.
latestAsset.Details:
Features

  • Builds connection with Amadeus Travel Innovation Sandbox
  • Provides a list of all Amadeus APIs
  • Makes it easy for you to call Amadeus APIs and view responses
  • Helps you develop travel apps with Amadeus to fetch required results.

Prerequisites

  • Kony Fabric v8
  • Amadeus account and an App created in it
  • Access key issued by Amadeus when you created an app

latestAsset.Description: The Employee App Data model aims to provide a quick starting point for building mobile apps dealing with employee data. You can easily extend/ reduce/ modify the App Data Model based on your use-case. You can also map the App Data Model to any backend data source.
latestAsset.Details:
Features

  • Quick reference app data model- Extend/ Reduce/ Modify based on your requirement
  • Map to any backend data source

The app data model abstracts common Employee fields and objects from the backend data source, allowing you to create a mobile app which is decoupled from backend data sources. You can then map any data source to the mobile app, without modifying the client side code.

Prerequisites

  • Kony account
  • Kony MobileFabric

latestAsset.Description: API.AI is a natural language understanding and machine learning platform that makes it easy for developers (and non-developers) to design and integrate intelligent and sophisticated conversational user interfaces into mobile apps, web applications, devices, and bots that continuously improve over time automatically. This Data Adapter lets you integrate the capabilities of API.AI into your Mobile application. Use this adapter to create delightful user interactions.
latestAsset.Details:
Features

  • Quickly integrate your apps with conversational bots developed in api.ai
  • Facility to connect to external web services through api.ai
  • Easy to make API calls provided by api.ai and view responses
  • Incorporate natural conversation and machine learning experiences into your applications

Prerequisites

  • Kony Fabric v8

latestAsset.Description: This API.ai connector will allow you to leverage a simple weather chatbot for retrieving weather information. You can ask the bot for weather updates for your location, and even get forecasts. Watch out for a rainy day!
latestAsset.Details:
Features

  • Easy to create applications to provide weather information
  • Builds connection with api.ai Weather Agent
  • Predefined APIs to fetch weather details
  • Easy to make API calls and view responses

Prerequisites

  • Kony Fabric v8

latestAsset.Description: Create a chat buddy in your application using this API.ai connector. Your users will never be lonely again. Happy Chatting!
latestAsset.Details:

  • Intelligent to converse small talks with your users
  • Builds connection with api.ai Small Talk Agent
  • Easy to make API calls and view responses

  • Kony Fabric v8

latestAsset.Description: Easily connect and retrieve weather data from Accuweather using your Accuweather provided API key. Get current weather for a specific location based on your current geolocation, zip code, city, state or country. Retrieve a weather forecast, show weather alerts and weather related maps and images using the Accuweather data adapter.

The app data model abstracts common place-fields and objects from the backend data source, allowing you to create a mobile app which is decoupled from backend data sources. You can then map any data source to the mobile app, without modifying the client side code.

Retrieve a weather forecast, show weather alerts and weather related maps and images easily with the help of this preconfigured ready to use services.

You can search through the list by genre, publishers, authors or ratings to get details about all books sold in the United States. The list has search results dated back from June 2008.

latestAsset.Description: Parallax scrolling uses multiple objects at different speeds to give the impression of a 3d effect where nearby objects have a larger parallax than more distant objects when observed from different positions. If you're looking for a popular scrolling effect used by native mobile apps and amazing websites, download the horizontal parallax.
latestAsset.Details:
Features

  • Parallax scrolling effect in a horizontal manner
  • Ability to animate background and foreground at different speeds
  • Facility to customize the UI elements.

Prerequisites

  • Kony Visualizer v8

latestAsset.Description: The app lets you search, discover and know more about your coworkers. It comes preconfigured with Login, Menu, Filter and List/Detail interface with Search and Dictionary functionalities. Set some properties, map the app data model with your backend and the app will be up and running in a few hours.
latestAsset.Details:

  • Easily configurable - customize as per your requirement

latestAsset.Description: A skeleton screen can be used as an alternative to a spinner to indicate loading progress. It gives a visual cue that things are happening immediately- the skeleton of the page has been loaded and the information is gradually loading.
latestAsset.Details:
Features

  • Appears as if a screen is loading
  • Indicates users what to expect when screen loads
  • Gives better user experience than pre-loaders to indicate loading progress
  • Useful component when a screen takes a long time to load.

Prerequisites

  • Kony account
  • Kony Visualizer v8

latestAsset.Description: Parallax scrolling uses multiple objects at different speeds to give the impression of a 3d effect where nearby objects have a larger parallax than more distant objects when observed from different positions. latestAsset.Description: Customer feedback is always important, and many apps use a rating prompt to influence users to provide public and private app store feedback. This component provides a quick jump start for creating a standard feedback and rating prompt.
latestAsset.Details:
Features

  • Prompts customers to provide feedback
  • Facilitates customers to provide feedback by giving ratings and a message
  • Displays “Thank you” message after receiving the feedback
  • Opportunity to improve customer experience based on received feedback

Prerequisites

  • Kony Visualizer v8

latestAsset.Description: Energize your textboxes using this bigger and better version. The animated textboxes component creates better user interactions, giving superior quality to your application, right out of the box. Labels for text entry fields can be animated thereby creating enhanced user experience for the end user. This also enables greater visibility for the label, which makes the data entry operation seamless. This component can be used in almost any situation where some kind of data entry is involved.
latestAsset.Details:
Features:

  • Text box with animation to placeholder text when user taps it
  • Advanced and intuitive UI element for mobile apps
  • Enhanced user experience and interaction
  • Useful component as a data entry field.

Prerequisites:

  • Kony Visualizer v8

latestAsset.Description: A floating action represents/promotes the primary action in an application. It is essentially a circular button floating over the UI. When pressed, it may present more related actions.
latestAsset.Details:
Features

  • Promote your app's primary actions
  • Add upto 5 floating actions
  • Select from 3 prebuilt animations
  • Customize UI with your own icons and text
  • Option to set background overlay

Prerequisites

  • Kony Visualizer v8

latestAsset.Description: Sliders are a common mechanism for filtering lists. This component helps you achieve that by letting you visually specify boundaries within a larger data set. The values between the boundaries are the ones that will be picked up the filter. This component will work in a large variety of scenarios. For example, if you want to show flights between $250 and $275 specifically when the cost of flights range from $150 to $500, then, this component will fit in and serve your use case seamlessly.
latestAsset.Details:
Features

  • Slider with a double handle to select a specific range from given range
  • Useful component for filtering lists
  • Ability to define intervals on the slider
  • Easy to achieve the single slider feature without developing it from scratch
  • Facility to customize the UI as you require.

Prerequisites

  • Kony Visualizer v8

latestAsset.Description: Sliders has been around for a long time and has become the de facto standard for selecting and filtering in apps. This component helps you achieve that by letting you visually select a value within a larger data set. This components incorporate the latest material design UX principles and cool animations that gives an enhanced User experience for the users.
latestAsset.Details:
Features

  • Slider with a single handle to select a specific value from given range
  • Easy to achieve the single slider feature without developing it from scratch
  • Ability to define intervals on the slider
  • Facility to customize the UI as you require.

Prerequisites

  • Kony Visualizer v8

latestAsset.Description: The Login component provides key front end capabilities typically used in a mobile apps login page. The modules provides typical functionality such as enforcing a minimum password length,minimum user ID length,local password encryption via the component properties directly within Visualizer. The component also provides a typical login UI that includes connectivity to Facebook, Office365, LinkedIn and Touch ID providing a quick login asset for use within apps the require authentication.
latestAsset.Details:
Features

  • Ready-to-use login form/screen for mobile apps

  • Ability to authenticate with fingerprint
  • Facility to customize every UI element
  • Easy connect to custom identity services

Prerequisites

latestAsset.Description: Bar chart or bar graph is a chart or graph that presents grouped data with rectangular bars with lengths proportional to the values that they represent. The bars can be plotted vertically or horizontally. A vertical bar graph is a chart that uses vertical bars to show comparisons among categories. One axis of the chart shows the specific categories being compared, and the other axis represents a discrete value.
latestAsset.Details:
Features:

  • Ready-to-use Vertical Bars Chart
  • Useful component for project analysis
  • Provides 3 built-in themes
  • Easy to plug into your app

Prerequisites:

  • Kony Visualizer v8

latestAsset.Description: Bar chart or bar graph is a chart or graph that presents grouped data with rectangular bars with lengths proportional to the values that they represent. The bars can be plotted vertically or horizontally. A horizontal bar graph is a chart that uses horizontal bars to show comparisons among categories. One axis of the chart shows the specific categories being compared, and the other axis represents a discrete value.

  • Kony Visualizer v8

latestAsset.Description: The refresh animation component can be used as a pull-to-refresh (or swipe-to-refresh) pattern that shows up when a user pulls down on a list of data using touch, in order to retrieve more data. Swipe to refresh works good for lists, grid lists, and card collections that are sorted by recent content (a collection is strictly sorted by descending date).
latestAsset.Details:
Features

  • Easy to achieve the refresh animation without developing it from scratch.
  • Facility to customize the UI as you require

Prerequisites

  • Kony Visualizer v8

latestAsset.Description: The refresh animation component can be used as a pull-to-refresh (or swipe-to-refresh) pattern that shows up when a user pulls down on a list of data using touch, in order to retrieve more data. latestAsset.Description: The Interstitial screen can be used to fill natural transition points in the flow of an app. E.g. when new content is being loaded or whenever a major change in state occurs that a clean break is required. It is primarily a loading screen. Whenever a delay is encountered, you can use this screen to keep the user engaged. For instance, use it to tell the user that his/her request has been received and the app is working on it.
latestAsset.Details:
Features

  • Ready-to-use Visualizer component
  • Keep user engaged while content is being loaded- use the Interstitial screen to tell the user what is being loaded and how brief the delay will be
  • Easy to customize

Prerequisites

  • Kony Visualizer v8

latestAsset.Description: Facebook is a popular free social networking website, online social media. Use Facebook Data Adapter to allow the registered users to keep in touch with friends, family and colleagues.
latestAsset.Details:
Features 

  • Ready-to-use adapter and simple to import. 
  • Easy to make API calls through simple interaction directly from MobileFabric. 
  • Facilitates easy interaction with the other groups and profiles from within the App. 
  • Secure and authentic. 


Prerequisites 

  • Kony Fabric v8

latestAsset.Description: Taxamo is a real-time solution to calculate tax for selling digital goods online. Use the Taxamo Data Adapter to allow your users to simplify tax calculations.
latestAsset.Details:
Features 

  • Ready-to-use adapter and simple to import. 
  • Easy to make API calls through simple interaction directly from MobileFabric. 
  • Facilitates easy transaction and can calculate tax on the transactions. 
  • Secure and authentic. 

Prerequisites 

  • Kony Fabric v8

latestAsset.Description: Data Adapter to connect to LinkedIn, the preeminent professional social network. It allows you to perform standard operations to a user profile, jobs and a company page.
latestAsset.Details:
Features :

  • Ready-to-use adapter and simple to import. 
  • Easy to make API calls through simple interaction directly from MobileFabric. 
  • Facilitates easy access to company and individual profiles, and share posts. 
  • Secure and authentic. 

Prerequisites :

  • Kony Fabric v8

latestAsset.Description: Botlytics lets your track and analyze the conversations that your bot has. Use the Botlytics Data Adapter to track the usage of your bot.
latestAsset.Details:
Features 

  • Ready-to-use adapter and simple to import. 
  • Easy to make API calls through simple interaction directly from MobileFabric. 
  • Facilitates better tracking of bot conversations. 
  • Authentic and easy to personalize. 

Prerequisites 

  • Kony Fabric v8

latestAsset.Description: bit.ly is a widely popular URL shortener tool. Users provide a long URL and obtain a short URL in return that is easy to share and consume. In addition, bit.ly offers useful metrics to track usage of the generated URL. An application of this feature is marketing campaigns: bit.ly enables creation and tracking of campaigns too.
latestAsset.Details:
Features
• Ready-to-use adapter and simple to import
• Easy to obtain short URLs from the long URLs shared by your application and vice-a-versa
• Easy to attain details through simple interaction directly from MobileFabric.

Prerequisites
• Kony Fabric v8

latestAsset.Description: Natural Language Processing (NLP) based Bots are an important aspect for applications today to keep pace with the mobile innovation and to provide the users a fully immersive digital experience with quick context based information to their everyday actions. This component provides a ready to use Chat bot for Kony Apps.
latestAsset.Details:
Features:

  • Enriches your app with Natural Language Processing (NLP) based Bot
  • Provides controls to customize the UI and to set events
  • Plugs into your app without any code.

latestAsset.Description: PayPal is a popular online money transfer service, and serves as an electronic alternative to traditional paper methods like checks and money orders. Integrate PayPal payments and services into your application using this PayPal Data Adapter.
latestAsset.Details:
Features 

  • Ready-to-use adapter and simple to import. 
  • Easy to make API calls through simple interaction directly from MobileFabric. 
  • Facilitates fast transactions through the payment gateway. 
  • Secure and authentic. 

Prerequisites

  • Kony Fabric v8

latestAsset.Description: Google Translate data adapter helps you integrate your mobile or web applications with Google Translation API. A mobile or web application integrated with Google Translation API helps users to translate text from one language to another (languages supported by Google Translation API).
latestAsset.Details:
Features

  • Easy to create applications to provide translation services
  • Builds connection with Google Translation API
  • Makes it easy for you to call APIs and view responses.

 Prerequisites

  • Kony Fabric v8

latestAsset.Description: Customer feedback is always important, and many apps use a rating prompt to influence users to provide feedback and ratings. This component provides a quick jump start for creating a standard feedback and rating prompt for your Kony Mobile Application.
latestAsset.Details:
Features: 

  • Prompts customers to provide feedback 
  • Facilitates customers to provide feedback by giving ratings and a message 
  • Displays “Thank you” message after receiving the feedback 
  • Opportunity to improve customer experience based on received feedback 

Prerequisites: 

  • Kony Visualizer v8

latestAsset.Description: Progress-bar gives instant visual feedback to the user on how far along he/she is in a process. Just drag and drop the component into your app, configure a few properties and that's all- you are ready to go.
latestAsset.Details:
Features

  • Ready-to-use Visualizer component
  • Simple and user-friendly UI to keep user updated on his/her progress
  • Determinate Progress bar- supports upto 8 states/steps
  • Easy to customize- use your own icons and color schemes

  • Useful component for project analysis
  • Easy to plug into your app
  • Facility to modify the UI

latestAsset.Description: Google Cloud Speech is a widely popular service for quick and accurate speech recognition supporting 80 languages. The Google Cloud Speech data adapter enables easy integration of speech recognition technologies into your applications. When an app sends recorded audio over the data adapter, it receives a text transcript from the Cloud Speech API service.
latestAsset.Details:
FEATURES:

  • Easy to create applications to provide Google Speech services
  • Builds connection with Google Speech API
  • Makes it easy for you to call APIs and view responses.

PREREQUISITES:

  • Kony Fabric v8

latestAsset.Description: This MVC application showcases the abilities of Kony Fabric Engagement Server in a real world scenario with cloud storage as back-end. The work order application highlights developing omni-channel apps that use both the desktop web and mobile channels to create, approve, reject, notify, assign & request the work orders and also to view the reports of completed work-orders.
latestAsset.Details:
The use-case that is discussed in this application is work order management that has both desktopweb and mobile channels with following flow

  1. Display of the all the existing work orders on desktopweb.
  2. Creating a new work order and making sure that it can be seen in the list.
  3. Assigning a work order to a technician and making sure that the technician receives a notification.
  4. The technician accepts the workorder and making sure that the status of the work order is updated in dekstopweb and mobile.
  5. Sending out a work sheet reminder to all the technicians from desktopweb and displaying the same on the technician’s device.
  6. Turning off the subscription of a device when the technician explicitly turns it off on the device for example when leaving on a vacation.
  7. Creating and starting a campaign when the requesting a technician to accept a work order. Also making sure that the technicians in the geoboundary receives that notification.
  8. Ensuring that the status of the work order is updated after it is accepted by the technician, once the notification from the campaign is received.

 
Features used:

  1. MF Object services with cloud storage as backend.
  2. MF Engagement services(Push Notifications,Adding subscribers, Campaign, Location & Segment creations etc).
  3. Reports module using highcharts.
  4. Kony Reference Architecture

latestAsset.Description: Sample application that demostrates the messaging and user engagement capabilities of Kony MobileFabric Messaging Services. Send push, SMS or email messages, capture user profile data, define user segmentation rules, run campaigns, and trigger event messages. This new version of the application also monitors the geoboundaries that are setup and receives the associated notifications.
latestAsset.Details:
This engagement server demo application demostrates the capabilities of the engagement server to connect to the engagement server, create subscriptions, and receive the push,SMS, email notifications from segments and campaigns. This enhanced version of the application also monitors the geoboundaries using the SDK API and will displays the local notifications, executes client logic or communicates with the engagement server based on the client logic option.

The source code of this application is located on github at:

https://github.com/kony/Kony-Engagement-Service-Demo-Visualizer-GeoBoundries-

latestAsset.Description: Blogger is a widely popular blogging service and one of the original platforms that made blogging mainstream. The data adapter enables viewing and updating of Blogger blogs. An integration with the data adapter in a mobile app can make blogging seamless.
latestAsset.Details:
Features:

  • Ready-to-use adapter and simple to import.
  • Easy to make API calls through simple interaction directly from MobileFabric.
  • Facilitates easy transaction and can calculate tax on the transactions.
  • Secure and authentic.

latestAsset.Description: The data adapter enables you to quickly integrate Getty Images content (images/ videos) and search experience, within your own application.
latestAsset.Details:
Features: 

  • Ready to use data adapter- just import it and choose from list of available APIs
  • Search and download images/ videos

latestAsset.Description: Alert popup can be used to notify user about any new information- be it an error or a transaction success message. The popup makes sure that user reads the message, for he/she must press the OK button before moving forward in app's flow.
latestAsset.Details:
Features: 

  • Easily configurable- set the alert message text, specify it's alignment, change the OK button text directly from Visualizer 
  • Fully customizable skins allow you to change look and feel of the component

latestAsset.Description: Confirmation popup is used when you need user's explicit confirmation to proceed with an action eg. while deleting a record.
latestAsset.Details:
Features: 

  • Easily configurable- set display text and other properties directly from Vizualizer 
  • Fully customizable skins allow you to change look and feel of the component

latestAsset.Description: The component is used when you need user's input before moving forward in app’s flow. E.g. you might want to capture user's comments about a task he/ she just completed.
latestAsset.Details:
Features:

  • Easily configurable- specify input prompt message, set input placeholder text, characters limits etc., directly from Vizualizer 
  • Fully customizable skins allow you to change look and feel of the component

latestAsset.Description: Standard username/password login- comes preconfigured with Kony user-repository; can be easily reconfigured to connect to your custom identity service. Drag and drop the component in your app, configure few properties and backend services- that’s all! you are ready to go.
latestAsset.Details:
Features:

  • Easy to configure Visualizer properties to enable local password encryption, provide username/password placeholders and your own logo, set validation rules like minimum password/ userID length, provide validation messages, enable Remember Me and much more
  • Fully customizable skins allow you to change look and feel of the component

latestAsset.Description: Plug and play component to list documents in your app. Usually it is consumed in conjugation with a document rendering component like PDF-viewer.
latestAsset.Details:
Features:

  • Fully customizable- in addition to document name and path, provide sub-text for additional information (author, creation/modification date etc.) and display image to distinguish different document types
  • Configure properties directly from Visualizer in case your document-list is static, otherwise use APIs to display the dynamic content

latestAsset.Description: The Work Order data model provides a quick start for building mobile/desktop web/tablet apps dealing with work orders data. Use the model to build apps for accepting new work orders, notifying a worker of a new work order and completing work orders. You can easily extend/ reduce/ modify the data model based on your needs. The data model backend is cloud storage and you can also map this to any backend data source.
latestAsset.Details:
The data model abstracts common work order fields and objects from the backend data source, allowing you to create a mobile/desktop web/tablet app which is decoupled from backend data sources. You can then map any data source to the app, without modifying the client side code. 

  • Quick reference app data model- to extend, reduce, and modify based on your requirements
  • Easily map business objects and terms to back end data sources.
  • Flexible to map with any back end data source

latestAsset.Description: New fintech payment services directives (PSD/PSD2) are set to open up competition across Europe, increase innovation online and promote mobile payments across borders, promoting digital payments from nontraditional payment providers. European banks need to implement PSD2 by January 2018, so the heat is on to implement the directive. Kony’s Open Banking Data Model (OBDM) is a subset of our retail banking platform to help open your bank to new opportunities.
latestAsset.Details:
You can also view the documentation for these open banking APIs at
https://portal.kony.com/100007369/openbank#!/app/apis

Login using the following credentials and view the documentation for the RBObjects services.
bankingdemo@kony.com / Demo1234!

Features:

  • Quickly expose PSD complaint API's
  • Simple, easy to use data model for exposing back end services.
  • Easily secure API's using Kony's Identity Management Services.
  • Promote third party integration from Payment Service Providers

Prerequisites:

  • Kony Fabric

latestAsset.Description: This data adapter enables seamless integration of Bing's Video Search functionality within your application.
latestAsset.Details:
Features:

  • Search for videos and get comprehensive results
  • Get preview thumbnails and other useful metadata about videos like encoding format, publisher/ creator info, video length, quality etc.
  • Narrow search results by video’s freshness, length , resolution and pricing
  • Get customized feed of trending videos

latestAsset.Description: This data adapter enables seamless integration of Bing's Autosuggest, Web, Image, Video and News Search functionality within your application.
latestAsset.Details:
Features:

  • Ready to use data adapter- just import it and choose from list of available APIs
  • Search specifically for Images/ Videos/ News content or use the all-in-one Web search
  • Use Autosuggest to provide real-time search suggestions to your users’ as they are typing-in the search query

latestAsset.Description: This data adapter enables seamless integration of Bing's Web Search functionality within your application.
latestAsset.Details:
Features:

  • Filter by result type (images, news, videos, webpages), freshness, user’s location and safe search level
  • Get spelling suggestions for misspelled queries
  • Help users discover more search options with a list of related queries

latestAsset.Description: This data adapter enables seamless integration of Bing's News Search functionality within your application.
latestAsset.Details:
Features:

  • Send a search query to Bing and get back a list of relevant news articles with details like provider info, date added, article URL/ image, related news and categories
  • Search news by topics like Politics, Sports etc.
  • Get trending news topics by region and category

latestAsset.Description: This data adapter enables seamless integration of Bing's Image Search functionality within your application.
latestAsset.Details:
Features:

  • Search for images and get comprehensive results
  • Get image insights like machine-generated captions, visually similar images, shopping and recipe sources, related image searches etc.
  • Narrow search results by image type, size, color, freshness and license.
  • Get customized feed of trending images

latestAsset.Description: Help users to complete their search faster by providing real-time autocomplete suggestions as they are typing-in their search query.
latestAsset.Details:
Features:

  • Send partial search query to Bing and get back a list of suggested queries
  • Provide a richer search box experience by fetching and displaying suggested search-terms each time the user types-in a new character

latestAsset.Description: The Open Banking initiative defines a set of APIs for Banks to expose their services for third-party developers to build integrated applications with. The Open Banking Backend Service can be used by a bank to build such integrated apps.
latestAsset.Details:
Features:

  • Ready-to-use adapter and simple to import.
  • Easy to make API calls through simple interaction directly from MobileFabric.
  • Facilitates easy transaction and can calculate tax on the transactions.
  • Secure and authentic

Prerequisite:

  • Kony Fabric v8

latestAsset.Description: Consider a case where a bank wants to notify its user about a transaction happened on his/her account. The bank can send notifications on all/any available notification channels – Push, SMS, Email – using the data adapter. With the data adapter, you can add Applications, Email and SMS configurations or create an event in Engagement Server. You can also enable subscriptions from the app.
latestAsset.Details:
Features:

  • Ready-to-use adapter and simple to import.
  • Easy to make API calls through simple interaction directly from MobileFabric.
  • Facilitates easy transaction and can calculate tax on the transactions.
  • Secure and authentic.

latestAsset.Description: COMING SOON. In the “Mobile and Customer First” generation, going cardless is quickly gaining popularity. For financial institutions, the ability to provide their account holders the ability to withdraw cash without the use of a card is quickly gaining popularity. The added security and ease of use of not having to swipe and or dip a physical bank card at the ATM provides new frictionless consumer experience at the ATM.
latestAsset.Details: The cardless cash feature provides the ability to pre-stage a cash withdrawal on a mobile device and pick-up cash at the ATM without the use of a bank card. This component includes an icon that will be on the shortcut menu ribbon, a form with pre-set amounts, and a One-Time Password generated to be used at the ATM to withdraw the cash. It also includes a button to find the nearest ATM and includes directions.

latestAsset.Description: COMING SOON. MoneyDesktop is a data-driven money management tool that securely integrates into digital banking products and enables users to take control of their finances. Budgeting, account aggregation, auto-categorization, and debt management are just a few of the tools that increase user loyalty and drive profitable growth.
latestAsset.Details:
Functions

  • Account Aggregation
  • Data Cleansing, Categorization and Classification
  • Transaction
  • Spending Wheels
  • Bubble Budgets
  • Trends
  • Debts
  • Net Worth
  • Goals
  • Cash Flow

latestAsset.Description: COMING SOON. Quickly view all documents with the Lanvera ePresentment platform. Built with intuitive responsive design, the interaction is optimized for any device. Mobile banking users have a consistent experience with any mobile banking provider solution securing direct access into the Lanvera ePresentment platform. With an industry first eAdmin, financial institutions can do what no other platform can. Clients control the look, feel, branding, messaging, marketing, and many other features of their ePresentment mobile site. And, the client-facing document feed is integrated directly into your app for a seamless transition.
latestAsset.Details:
• Credential based
  • Comprehensive Reporting
  • Self-service eAdmin capabilities
  • Mobile-first design
  • Document viewing and filter management
  • Comprehensive analytics and reporting
  • Complete marketing tool set

latestAsset.Description: Facebook OAuth Adapter validates the Google authentication of the users before accessing your application. It helps to get the user’s Facebook profile data and allows a user to access Facebook resources.
latestAsset.Details:
• This OAuth Adapter is an easy to use connector that is built-in and readily available in Kony Fabric
  • There is no download of the OAuth Adapter needed
  • You can connect to the services provided by the OAuth Adapter directly from the Kony Fabric console
  • You can also connect your Visualizer application to the services provided by the OAuth Adapter via the built-in Kony Fabric interface

latestAsset.Description: LinkedIn is a professional networking website. Use LinkedIn oAuth adapter to validate the LinkedIn authentication of the users before accessing your application. It helps to get the user’s LinkedIn profile data and allows a user to access LinkedIn resources

• This OAuth Adapter is an easy to use connector that is built-in and readily available in Kony Fabric
  • There is no download of the OAuth Adapter needed
  • You can connect to the services provided by the OAuth Adapter directly from the Kony Fabric console
  • You can also connect your Visualizer application to the services provided by the OAuth Adapter via the built-in Kony Fabric interface

latestAsset.Description: The component helps authenticate users by their voice. It is one of the most natural means of biometric identification- your customers no longer need to remember passwords and PINs, their voice is their ID.

• Seamless integration with banking/ payment applications 
  • In-app authentication of user 
  • Configure properties directly form Visualizer properties panel
